greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A transform of the Fibonacci numbers.
comment: The g.f. is the transform of the g.f. of A000045 under the mapping G(x)-> (-1/(1+x))G((x-1)/(x+1)). In general this mapping transforms x/(1-kx-kx^2) into (1-x)/(1+2(k+1)x-(2k-1)x^2).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-4,1)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x - 1)/(x^2 - 4 x - 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 10 2011 *)
xref: Cf. A099842, A015448, A152174 (binomial transform), A084326 (shifted unsigned inverse binomial transform).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Oct 27 2004
